  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.purplehillsbooks.json.JSONObject(String)
    don't use this, use the JSONTokener instead. The JSON stream should never be a string, but instead should always be a Stream. It is always more efficient to stream the JSON representation in and out. Never use a string for this.
    com.purplehillsbooks.testframe.TestRecorderText(Writer, boolean, String[], String)
    constructor, use the one below instead
    com.purplehillsbooks.xml.ValidationResults(Document, Element)
